parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or jerk, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle may exhibit symptoms such as jerking
or loss of power when accelerating

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine can cause the vehicle to stall, lose power, or overheat, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle may exhibit symptoms such as loud knocking or grinding noises

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power train can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or jerk, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle may exhibit symptoms such as jerking
or loss of power when accelerating

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive oil consumption can lead to engine damage, increased emissions, and decreased fuel efficiency, potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Burning oil at an excessive rate (1500-2000 miles per 2-3 quarts)

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system failures can cause various safety issues, including loss of control, accidents, and fires.
symptoms: Daytime running lights and brake lights going out and coming back on randomly
driver window rolling down by itself
forward collision light coming on at random
steering wheel jerking to the right on its own

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Poor security features can make the vehicle an easy target for theft, potentially causing harm to others and financial losses.
symptoms: or hot-wired due to ease of access
viral social media videos displaying how to steal Kia's with ease.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Faulty brake lights can increase the risk of accidents, as other drivers may not be aware of the vehicle's intentions.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Stalling and Loss of Power
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine stalling and loss of power can cause accidents, especially when occurring at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: losing power while pulling out into traffic
car locking wheels and slamming onto a curb
emergency braking applying for no reason.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Wiring and electrical component failures can cause various safety issues, including fires, loss of control, and accidents.
symptoms: Alternator overheating and catching on fire
which chewed the wires and caused electrical components to short out.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering and Collision Avoidance System Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Steering and collision avoidance system failures can increase the risk of accidents, as the vehicle may not respond as intended.
Engine failure can cause the vehicle to stall or lose motive power, increasing the risk of a crash, and potentially leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or loses power
the check engine warning light is illuminated
the vehicle makes a rattling noise
oil is spilling from the car

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission failure can cause the vehicle to stall or lose acceleration, increasing the risk of a crash, and potentially leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: the RPM gauge redlines with no movement to the wheels
or the transmission has multiple catastrophic failures.
